member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.ConvertBackNotSupportedValueConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to This value converter does not support ConvertBack method..

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.InvertBoolWrongValueTypeConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value is neither a bool nor a nullable bool..

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.WrongGenericArgumentValueConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The generic argument of this ValueConverter must be the type of the implemented class..

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.WrongParameterTypeTypedValueConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The parameter passed to this TypedValueConverter does not match the parameter type..

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.WrongTargetTypeTypedConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The target type passed to this TypedValueConverter does not match the output type..

member.name: P:WpfEx.Views.Properties.Exceptions.WrongValueTypeTypedConverter
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The value passed to this TypedValueConverter does not match the input type..

member.name: T:WpfEx.Views.ValueConverter`1
member.summary: A base abstract class to implement value converters. It implements the interface and provides overridable methods to check arguments and convert values. This class inherits from to allow converters to be inlined directly as markup extension. Only a single instance of each type of converter will exist so the implementations of this class must remains stateless objects.
member.typeparam: The type of value converter being implemented.

member.name: F:WpfEx.Views.ValueConverter`1.instance
member.summary: The single instance of value converter for the given type.

member.name: M:WpfEx.Views.ValueConverter`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: The generic parameter does not match the type of converter being instanced.

member.name: M:WpfEx.Views.ValueConverter`1.VerifyConvertArguments(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Verifies that the arguments of the method are correct. This method does not return any result, it simply throw exceptions when the arguments are incorrect.
member.param: The value argument of the method.
The targetType argument of the method.
The parameter argument of the method.
The culture argument of the method.
